title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma and other LLMs locally with a single CLI or REST API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama API—works in Node, Deno, Bun and browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client and asyncio bindings for Ollama; pip install ollama.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models as LLMs or chat models.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-web)”
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model management, RAG, dark mode).

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive REPL wrapper around ollama with history, syntax highlighting & multi-line editing.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Lightweight GitHub Copilot-style VS-Code extension that uses local Ollama models.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template combining Ollama + Chroma + LangChain for private Q&A.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that streams Ollama replies into any channel; runs via Docker.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot integration for Ollama with thread support and model switching.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM client library for Ollama (Android, Spring, plain Java).

title: ollama-nvidia-docker
summary: Official CUDA-enabled container images for Ollama on NVIDIA GPUs.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community-built Rust crate providing async bindings to the Ollama API.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama with streaming chat completions and embeddings.

title: ollama-models
summary: Curated collection of Modelfile recipes (Llama 3, Phi-3, Mixtral, CodeLlama, etc.).

title: ollama-direnv
summary: Direnv extension that auto-starts Ollama when entering a project directory.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin for local AI-assisted writing using Ollama models.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-rustico
summary: Lightweight TUI dashboard for Ollama written in Rust for monitoring models.
